Specials slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content previous slide next slide Visit Our Taproom A DIVERSE TAPLIST, FULL IN-HOUSE FOOD MENU, AND DAILY SPECIALS Food Menu Groups & Parties YOUR EVENT, OUR SPACE Holy City Brewing boasts four different event spaces for every function and occasion, no matter the event. The Mezzanine is a private upstairs dining room with its own bar. The Aqua Lounge is a 21-and-up game room. The Courtyard is an open-air space that can fit up to one hundred guests. The Porter Room is for the biggest of events, with its own prep kitchen, full bar, and marshside views. Host an Event Raw Bar The Walrus at Holy City is our in-house raw bar, offering delicious cuisine from the sea, both near and far. Oysters on the half-shell, ceviche and peel-and-eat shrimp are some of the usual suspects being served here, but their menu and wine selection rotate regularly. The offerings from the Raw Bar can be ordered from any server around the property. Wed-Thu-Fri-Sat 11am-9pm. Our Story Serving the community since 2011 The Holy City story is about a team of four guys dedicated to craft beer and their community, aiming to bring more of one to the other.
